uk.co.strangeskies.observable

Class HotObservable<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.strangeskies.observable.HotObservable<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of event message to produce
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<M>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveExpression, IterableObservable, ObservableListDecorator, ObservablePropertyImpl, ObservableSetDecorator, SynchronizedObservableList, SynchronizedObservableSet

    public class HotObservable<M>
extends Object
implements Observable<M>
    A simple implementation of Observable which maintains a list of listeners to receive events fired with sendNext(Object).

    Addition and removal of observers, as well as the firing of events, are synchronized on the implementation object.

    This implementation does not support backpressure, so listeners which need to control demand must compose the observable with e.g. a buffering or dropping operation.
